recvfile.cpp

00001 #ifndef WIN32
00002    #include <arpa/inet.h>
00003 #else
00004    #include <winsock2.h>
00005    #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00006 #endif
00007 #include <fstream>
00008 #include <iostream>
00009 #include <cstdlib>
00010 #include <cstring>
00011 #include <udt.h>
00012 
00013 using namespace std;
00014 
00015 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00016 {
00017    if ((argc != 5) || (0 == atoi(argv[2])))
00018    {
00019       cout << "usage: recvfile server_ip server_port remote_filename local_filename" << endl;
00020       return 0;
00021    }
00022 
00023    // use this function to initialize the UDT library
00024    UDT::startup();
00025 
00026    UDTSOCKET fhandle = UDT::socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00027 
00028    sockaddr_in serv_addr;
00029    serv_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00030    serv_addr.sin_port = htons(short(atoi(argv[2])));
00031 #ifndef WIN32
00032    if (inet_pton(AF_INET, argv[1], &serv_addr.sin_addr) <= 0)
00033 #else
00034    if (INADDR_NONE == (serv_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr(argv[1])))
00035 #endif
00036    {
00037       cout << "incorrect network address.\n";
00038       return 0;
00039    }
00040    memset(&(serv_addr.sin_zero), '\0', 8);
00041 
00042    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::connect(fhandle, (sockaddr*)&serv_addr, sizeof(serv_addr)))
00043    {
00044       cout << "connect: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00045       return 0;
00046    }
00047 
00048    // send name information of the requested file
00049    int len = strlen(argv[3]);
00050 
00051    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::send(fhandle, (char*)&len, sizeof(int), 0))
00052    {
00053       cout << "send: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00054       return 0;
00055    }
00056 
00057    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::send(fhandle, argv[3], len, 0))
00058    {
00059       cout << "send: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00060       return 0;
00061    }
00062 
00063    // get size information
00064    int64_t size;
00065 
00066    if (UDT::ERROR == UDT::recv(fhandle, (char*)&size, sizeof(int64_t), 0))
00067    {
00068       cout << "send: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00069       return 0;
00070    }
00071 
00072    // receive the file
00073    fstream ofs(argv[4], ios::out | ios::binary | ios::trunc);
00074    int64_t recvsize; 
00075    int64_t offset = 0;
00076 
00077    if (UDT::ERROR == (recvsize = UDT::recvfile(fhandle, ofs, offset, size)))
00078    {
00079       cout << "recvfile: " << UDT::getlasterror().getErrorMessage() << endl;
00080       return 0;
00081    }
00082 
00083    UDT::close(fhandle);
00084 
00085    ofs.close();
00086 
00087    // use this function to release the UDT library
00088    UDT::cleanup();
00089 
00090    return 1;
00091 }
